Welcome to OpenCTF documentation!¶

OpenCTF is a new multipurpose CTF platform, developed for use in EasyCTF 2016, but can be used to deploy a CTF anywhere! Featuring an easy installation process and a full admin panel, OpenCTF serves CTF organizers who may not want to spend the effort writing their own platform.

Check out our Getting Started page for instructions on how to quickly set up and deploy your own instance of this CTF platform.
